content:
ToolStripGripStyle Enum

Definition

Specifies visibility of a ToolStrip move handle (grip).

In this Article

public enum ToolStripGripStyle
Inheritance
Object
ValueType
System.Enum
ToolStripGripStyle

Remarks

In a stack layout, make a ToolStrip movable by putting it in a ToolStripPanel and ensuring that its GripStyle is set to Visible.

Fields

Hidden

Specifies that a ToolStrip move handle (grip) is not visible.
Visible

Specifies that a ToolStrip move handle (grip) is visible.
